notesStmt.note: Translation of: Les six livres de la république.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Variant: with a printed slip in Latin bearing a commendation by W. Sh[uger]. This note is reprinted on the cancel title page of STC 3193.5.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
